ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Active servers?
ygData.msgSnippet: How is Drinal working for you.  I m looking to restart EQ and I want to jump to whatever server is the most noob friendly ( is that an oxymoron? ) Honestly,
ygData.messageBody:
How is Drinal working for you. I'm looking to restart EQ and I want to jump to whatever server is the most noob friendly ( is that an oxymoron? ) Honestly, I'm also looking at an EQ Private Server called Shards of Dalaya as an option and it looks so fun! ( and free too ) but not Sony sponsored. I miss EQ but I really don't want to get into the 65+ stuff, just really want to relive the good times =)

Scott (Paria)
Yeah, I know, I'm one of those old farts... whatever.

-----Original Message-----
From: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EverQuest@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Todd
Sent: Tuesday, January 15, 2008 12:35 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Active servers?

Just the other day (Sat.) I logged back on to EQ and started a new
Beast Lord on the Drinal (formally Tarew Marr) server. I have
another friend that did the same. We managed to make level 20 in one
day with out twinking... Most of the time I will be on in the
mornings because I work nights so if you see a toon named "Drakeson"
go ahead and say Hi.. I'm looking forward to getting back into EQ
again..

Todd

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "gollackdeathreaper"
<gollackdeathreaper@...> wrote:
>
> Wow it's nice to see that the servers are still active. I will
start a
> newbie toon on Drinal then.
>

exploring
